doc.title: Legerdemain Up-to-Date, or The Great Hermann Outdone
doc.plot: The greatest magical film ever attempted. New and sensational. This film deals in an up-to-date manner with which up-to-date tricks can be accomplished. The conjurer steps upon the stage, walks to the center, stops, and his duplicate walks on, making two. The second stands in the center of the stage, completely covering the picture. The conjurer causes him to disappear with a wave of his hand. With another wave of his hand and a stamp of his foot, the upper part of the scenery disappears and in its place three large heads, exact duplicates of each other appear and hold an animated conversation with each other the conjurer, finally causing them to disappear. With a stamp of his foot a large shawl suddenly appears on the floor, picking this up and holding it before himself he jumps upward and with it disappears but is immediately walking on the stage from the side with the shawl in his hand. He then throws the shawl to the opposite side and to the amazement of all is seen to!
